PropertyList.title: Goodyear Type-K airship

key.name: W
key.desc: Weigh-off to 1000 lbs heavy by adding/removing ballast. (Takes about 10 seconds and only works on ground.)

key.name: R
key.desc: Pull the rip cord. Do NOT use in midair.

key.name: Q/q
key.desc: Open/close the damper for the forward ballonet.

key.name: A/a
key.desc: Open/close the damper for the aft ballonet.

key.name: Y
key.desc: Release mooring mast connection or wire.

key.name: U
key.desc: Attach mooring wire. Only possible within 100 feet of the mooring mast.

key.name: w
key.desc: Walk view: walk forwards, +shift to run.

key.name: a
key.desc: Walk view: side step left, +shift to run.

key.name: d
key.desc: Walk view: side step right, +shift to run.

PropertyList.text:
____________________Engine controls____________________
____________________Limitations____________________ Vne : 70 kt Vmo :
Maximum permissible rate of climb: 2400 ft/min Maximum permissible rate of descent: 1200 ft/min (1.25 inH20 @ 50 kt)
Envelope Maximum pressure 3.0 inH2O ( 747 Pa; 15.6 psf) Minimum pressure 0.5 inH2O ( 125 Pa; 2.6 psf)
C.G. Range Normal 1346.4 in
Maximum total car load: 18300 lbs (2300 lbs over design load)
Maximum equilibrium weight : lbs ( kg) Maximum static heavyness: In Flight : lbs ( kg) Take off/Landing : lbs ( kg) Maximum static lightness : lbs ( kg)
Maximum operating altitude : ft
________________FlightGear Pilot's Notes_______________
http://wiki.flightgear.org/index.php/Goodyear_K-Type_Airship
